backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that creates orders with quantity and totalAmount, stores them in a Map, and exposes APIs to create and retrieve orders.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old orders to new format by adding quantity and totalAmount fields and returning an updated actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing recent frontend features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including UI, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes with custom color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling navigation, modals, promo popup, order form, and WhatsApp handoff after successful orders.
frontend/src/components/OrderForm.tsx: Order form supporting plate selection, quantity input, minimum order validation, and backend order creation.
frontend/src/components/PromoPopup.tsx: Session-based promotional popup that displays an offer and routes users to the order section.
frontend/src/components/SimpleModal.tsx: Modal component displaying messages and WhatsApp fallback link with copy support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Provides a mutation hook to create an order through the backend actor and invalidates order queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, identity loading, and state management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color theme with custom utilities and animations.
frontend/src/lib/orderRules.ts: Contains minimum order validation logic and helper messages for delivery requirements.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links with prefilled order messages and provides a helper to open them.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, issues, and the current state of the Bro Bro Foods app.
